### Load Packages
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```


### Load Data
```{r}
source('scripts/import_crds.R')
source('scripts/import_crds_sep.R')
crds <- import.crds('CSV', 'metadata_practice.csv')
crds.all <- import.crds.sep('CSV', 'metadata_practice.csv')
```

### Organize RelTime
```{r}
crds.std <- 




```

### Summarize by Substrate + ABX
```{r}
crds.sum <- crds %>%
  group_by(Substrate, ABX, Season, RelTime) %>%
  summarize(Mean = mean(Delta),
            Median = median(Delta),
            SD = sd(Delta),
            SE = se(Delta),
            iqr = IQR(Delta))
```



### Plot
```{r}
## All individuals
ggplot(crds, aes(x=RelTime, y=Delta, color=ID)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_point()

## Substrate/ABX
ggplot(crds.sum, aes(x=RelTime, y=Mean, color=Substrate)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_point() +
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = Mean-SE, ymax = Mean+SE))

```


### Extra Functions
```{r}
se <- function(x){
  sd(x)/sqrt(length(x))
}
```
